name: Smartphone X
shortDescription: Powerful and sleek smartphone with advanced features.
longDescription: The Smartphone X is a cutting-edge device designed for seamless communication and advanced functionality. With a powerful processor, stunning display, and innovative features, it's the perfect companion for your busy lifestyle.

name: Laptop Pro
longDescription: Introducing the Laptop Pro, a powerhouse designed for professionals seeking top-notch performance. With a sleek design, high-resolution display, and advanced computing capabilities, it's your go-to device for productivity on the go.

name: Wireless Earbuds Pro
shortDescription: Immersive sound experience with cutting-edge wireless technology.
longDescription: Experience music like never before with our Wireless Earbuds Pro. These earbuds deliver a truly immersive audio experience with the latest wireless technology, ensuring crystal-clear sound and ultimate comfort for extended listening sessions.

name: Gaming Console X
shortDescription: Next-gen gaming console for an unparalleled gaming experience.
longDescription: Immerse yourself in the world of gaming with the Gaming Console X. Boasting next-gen graphics and powerful performance, this console delivers an unparalleled gaming experience. Get ready for breathtaking visuals and responsive gameplay like never before.

name: Smart Watch Pro
shortDescription: Advanced smartwatch with health and fitness tracking features.
longDescription: Elevate your fitness journey with the Smart Watch Pro. This advanced smartwatch not only keeps you connected but also monitors your health and fitness in real-time. Stay motivated with personalized insights and achieve your wellness goals effortlessly.
